org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

接口 CheckpointRecoveryFactory

  • 所有已知实现类:
    StandaloneCheckpointRecoveryFactory, ZooKeeperCheckpointRecoveryFactory

    public interface CheckpointRecoveryFactory
    A factory for per Job checkpoint recovery components.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      CheckpointIDCounter createCheckpointIDCounter(JobID jobId)
      Creates a CheckpointIDCounter instance for a job.
      CompletedCheckpointStore createCheckpointStore(JobID jobId, int maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain, java.lang.ClassLoader userClassLoader)
      Creates a CompletedCheckpointStore instance for a job.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createCheckpointStore

        CompletedCheckpointStore createCheckpointStore(JobID jobId,
                                               int maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain,
                                               java.lang.ClassLoader userClassLoader)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a CompletedCheckpointStore instance for a job.
        参数:
        jobId - Job ID to recover checkpoints for
        maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain - Maximum number of checkpoints to retain
        userClassLoader - User code class loader of the job
        返回:
        CompletedCheckpointStore instance for the job
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createCheckpointIDCounter

        CheckpointIDCounter createCheckpointIDCounter(JobID jobId)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a CheckpointIDCounter instance for a job.
        参数:
        jobId - Job ID to recover checkpoints for
        返回:
        CheckpointIDCounter instance for the job
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
